titles: Here after foloweth a mornynge remembrau[n]ce had at the moneth mynde of the noble prynces Margarete countesse of Rychemonde [et] Darbye moder vnto kynge Henry the. vii. [et] grandame to oure souerayne lorde that nowe is, vppon whose soule almyghty god haue mercy
author: Fisher, John, Saint, 1469-1535.
publisher: In Flete strete at the sygne of the sonne by Wynkyn de Worde,
notes: Running title reads: Compyled by ye reuerent fader in god. Iohan Fyssher bysshop of Rochestre.
Place of publication and printer's name from colophon; publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Beaufort, Margaret, --  Countess of Richmond and Derby, 1443-1509.
